summary: A scimitar like blade with lightning effects borrowed from Dragonbane
descriptionHtml:
This here is Stormfang. It is a scimitar like weapon with lightning shader from dragonbane. I adjusted it so it is not too annoying or noticeable. The weapon is one handed and is craftable under daedric category. It is 1 point stronger attack than daedric sword and has longer reach since it is physically longer. 

My mods:
Hidans Scythe - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16401
Infinity Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17255
Legion Helmet - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18341
Phoenix Katana - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16935
Stormfang Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18494
Grayson Sword - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17552
Zabuzas Executioner Blade - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16753
author: siberok92
